originalText.text: My daughter goes here on the weekends and loves it.  Very good workout and great place to learn self defense.  Coolest place to learn and exercise in NYC.

text.text: My daughter goes here on the weekends and loves it.  Very good workout and great place to learn self defense.  Coolest place to learn and exercise in NYC.

originalText.text: I started training at the USA Shaolin Temple because I wanted to learn authentic Kung Fu from a legitimate Kung Fu Master, Shifu Shi Yan Ming. Little did I know that my Shaolin Education would go far beyond just the practice of martial arts. Since training at the temple, I have learned authentic Kung Fu, but I have also learned about community, respecting myself, the spiritual practices of Chan Buddhism, and much more. Practicing Kung Fu is now a key factor in my life to help me maintain my physical, and mental health, and is a great way to deal with, and let go of life’s stressors. Training with Shifu Shi Yan Ming has also taught me to push, and challenge myself which has greatly enhanced all other aspects of my life, and has led to many journeys that I would not have gone on before my training.

originalText.text: I’ve been a member for a very long time. Always wanted to learn from the best and so happy that to have the opportunity. However I never realized how life changing it would be. I have come to understand what Sifu always preaches “ You help yourself by helping others” I just got it now after 10 years. Thank you Sifu! ❤️

text.text: I’ve been a member for a very long time. Always wanted to learn from the best and so happy that to have the opportunity. However I never realized how life changing it would be. originalText.text:
For over 15 years I had the dream of training here. In 2017 I finally had the opportunity to move NYC and make it happen. The prices are steep but I knew that going in. I expected at least a mildly warm welcome but received the opposite. With that cost and a Buddhist philosophy I was really taken aback by it. I did an introductory Tai-Chi class (taught by a student) and liked it enough to want to see how the Saturday morning dharma talks were before finalizing my entry as a student. I walked in on Saturday morning to an extremely rude Sifu and a group of students. He was bragging about dinner with Trump and watching CNN. I left and never returned.
Only after I found excellent training a few blocks away did I learn about the temple's reputation for being over priced, pretentious training and an unsafe environment for women.
It took a while to get over the disappointment but in the end it was fuel for my Tai-Chi training and education.

I expected at least a mildly warm welcome but received the opposite. With that cost and a Buddhist philosophy I was really taken aback by it. I did an introductory Tai-Chi class (taught by a student) and liked it enough to want to see how the Saturday morning dharma talks were before finalizing my entry as a student. I walked in on Saturday morning to an extremely rude Sifu and a group of students. He was bragging about dinner with Trump and watching CNN. I left and never returned.
Only after I found excellent training a few blocks away did I learn about the temple's reputation for being over priced, pretentious training and an unsafe environment for women.
It took a while to get over the disappointment but in the end it was fuel for my Tai-Chi training and education.

originalText.text:
More chi Train Harder. Great place to train Kung Fu.
From the first time I walked into the temple I knew this place was the real deal. Students were lined up in 2 columns training back and forth . The sifu was teaching as well as a couple advanced students. The energy in the temple was awesome. Lots of sweat and powerful noise coming from each student.  This type of training is the foundation of shaolin Kung Fu. The USA Shaolin temple was calling my name from that day forward. I started training at the temple for years and only stopped going because of work and moving out of the city. This place will change your mind and change your body. I highly recommend the USA Shaolin temple.
